scripts.validate: ajv -d src/data/samplePowers.json -s src/schema/samplePowers.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json &&  ajv -d src/data/standardPowers.json -s src/schema/standardPowers.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json && ajv -d src/data/modifiersData.json -s src/schema/modifiersData.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json && ajv -d src/data/standardAdvantages.json -s src/schema/standardAdvantages.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json && ajv -d src/data/standardEquipment.json -s src/schema/standardEquipment.schema.json -r src/schema/common.schema.json
